snippet: Egypt’s elections commission on Tuesday formally declared the former defense chief, Abdel Fattah el-Sisi, the winner of last week’s pro forma presidential election with nearly 97 percent of the vote.
abstract: Egypt’s elections commission formally declares former defense chief Abdel Fattah el-Sisi winner of the 2014 presidential election with nearly 97 percent of the vote; turnout was about 47 percent of eligible voters.
lead_paragraph: Egypt’s elections commission on Tuesday formally declared the former defense chief, Abdel Fattah el-Sisi, the winner of last week’s pro forma presidential election with nearly 97 percent of the vote.
